FuncDef: The upgrade lpu by-testbus command upgrades the interface board through testbus.
CLIs: upgrade lpu by-testbus <slot-id> { startup | <filename> } { lpu-epld | lpu-epld2 | lpu-epld3 | lpu-epld4 | lpu-epld5 | pic0-epld | pic1-epld | pic0-pwr-epld | pic1-pwr-epld | pwr-epld }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an LPU slot list. You can specify one slot at a time.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Indicates that the current startup system software is used for the upgrade.
-

Specifies the name of the system software stored in the CF card.
The value is a string of 4 to 127  case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Indicates that the current startup system software is used for the upgrade.
-

Examples: Warning:  This command may affect operation by wrong use, please carefully use it with HUAWEI engineer's direction. Are you sure to do this operation? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If an interface board cannot register, you can upgrade it through testbus. Confirm the label of the lpu is correct before upgrade.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
